explanations.machine learning: The paper discusses the application of machine learning techniques for stock market prediction.
explanations.unsupervised learning: The paper mentions using NMF (Non-negative Matrix Factorization) to unsupervised learn part-based representations of the data.
explanations.classification: The paper uses logistic regression, a classification method, to predict stock trends.
explanations.regression: The paper specifically mentions L2-regularized logistic regression for modeling the relationship between factors and stock quality.
explanations.feature representation: The paper discusses learning part-based representations of the data, which is related to feature representation.
explanations.representation learning: The use of NMF to learn part-based representations of the data is an example of representation learning.
